amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency (zero emission cargo transport grant) by $20 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $20,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities Account by $20,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 252 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 252 (Roll no. 323).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Takano.
